parameters.name: NumberOfDays
parameters.label: Number of Days
parameters.description: Select range of days to query

content.query:
union CommonSecurityLog | 
where (DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:violation") |
where TimeGenerated > ago({NumberOfDays}d) |
summarize count = count() by ViolationType = DeviceCustomString1
content.title: Violation Types

content.query:
let binSize = iff({NumberOfDays} > 1, 1d, 1h);
union CommonSecurityLog | 
where (DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:violation") |
where TimeGenerated > ago({NumberOfDays}d) | 
make-series event_count=count() default=0 on TimeGenerated in range (ago({NumberOfDays}d), now(), binSize) |
mvexpand TimeGenerated, event_count |
project todatetime(TimeGenerated), toint(event_count)
content.title: Violations Over Time

content.query:
union CommonSecurityLog | 
where (DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:violation") |
where (DeviceCustomString1 == "USER_CREDENTIALS") |
where TimeGenerated > ago({NumberOfDays}d) |
summarize NumberOfViolations = count() by TopViolatingHost = SourceHostName |
top 5 by NumberOfViolations desc
content.title: Domain User Credentials - Top Violating Hosts

items.name: Domain User Credentials Top Violating Hosts

content.query:
union CommonSecurityLog | 
where (DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:violation") |
where (DeviceCustomString1 == "USER_CREDENTIALS") |
where TimeGenerated > ago({NumberOfDays}d) |
summarize NumberOfViolations = count() by TopViolatingUsers = SourceUserName |
top 5 by NumberOfViolations desc
content.title: Domain User Credentials - Top Violating Users

items.name: Domain User Credentials Top Violating Users

content.query:
union CommonSecurityLog | 
where (DeviceEventClassID == "illusive:violation") |
where (DeviceCustomString1 == "SUSPICIOUS_FILES") |
where TimeGenerated > ago({NumberOfDays}d) |
summarize NumberOfViolations = count() by TopSuspiciousFilesHashes = DeviceCustomString3  |
top 5 by NumberOfViolations desc
content.title: Suspicious Files - Top Violating Processes
